summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Hero Carousel and Admin Settings features for Novatech Education Center. All backend APIs (15/15 tests passed) and frontend features are working correctly.

minor.issue: Rate limiting is aggressive (30 requests/minute) which can cause 520 errors during heavy testing. Consider increasing for development/testing environments.

issues: There appear to be duplicate slides in the database (6 slides shown but only 3 unique). This may be from multiple seed operations.

passed_tests: Backend: Admin login with provided credentials (200 OK)
Backend: GET /api/slides returns slides with localized content
Backend: POST /api/slides creates new slide (authenticated)
Backend: PUT /api/slides/{id} updates slide (authenticated)
Backend: DELETE /api/slides/{id} deletes slide (authenticated)
Backend: GET /api/settings returns site settings with contact info and social media
Backend: PUT /api/settings updates settings (authenticated)
Backend: All public endpoints (courses, testimonials, teachers, blogs) working
Frontend: Homepage hero carousel displays correctly with slides from database
Frontend: Carousel navigation arrows work (next/prev)
Frontend: Carousel dots navigation works
Frontend: Footer displays dynamic social media links from settings
Frontend: Contact page displays dynamic contact info (address, phone, email, map)
Frontend: WhatsApp floating button uses dynamic number from settings
Frontend: Admin login page works with correct credentials
Frontend: Admin navigation shows Hero Slides and Site Settings menu items
Frontend: Admin Hero Slides page loads with slide list
Frontend: Admin Hero Slides has Add, Edit, Delete, Reorder functionality
Frontend: Admin Settings page loads with 3 tabs (General, Contact Info, Social Media)
Frontend: Admin Settings - WhatsApp number editable with preview
Frontend: Admin Settings - Contact info editable (phones, email, multi-language address)
Frontend: Admin Settings - Social media toggles and URLs editable
critical_code_review_comments: Consider adding pagination for slides list if many slides are added
Duplicate slides in database suggest seed endpoint may have been called multiple times - consider adding idempotency check
seed_data_creation: Existing seed data used - slides and settings already in database
context_for_next_testing_agent: All hero carousel and admin settings features are working. Backend tests are in /app/backend/tests/test_hero_carousel_settings.py. Rate limiting may cause 520 errors if too many requests are made quickly - wait 60 seconds between heavy test runs.
